response.original_title: SILENT SIREN - Silent Siren Live Tour 2019 "31313"
response.overview: Features SILENT SIREN's concert held on June 9 at Zepp DiverCity. Also features promotional videos by the members, and a live track for "NO GIRL NO CRY (SILENT SIREN ver.)" taken from their concert held on June 10 at Zepp DiverCity.  1 -Opening- 2 MUJUURYOKU DANCE 無重力ダンス 3 Go Way! 4 merry-go-round 5 19 summer note. 6 Attack 7 ODOREmotion 8 TENKAIPPIN NO THEME 天下一品のテーマ 9 Letter 10 REBORN 11 CREAM SODA クリームソーダ 12 KAWAKANAI NAMIDA 渇かない涙 13 SHIGATSU NO KAZE 四月の風 14 SOTSUGYOU 卒業 15 SINBAD シンドバッド 16 FUJIYAMA DISCO フジヤマディスコ 17 HACHIGATSU NO YORU 八月の夜 18 What show is it? 19 ALC.Monster 20 KOI NO ESPER 恋のエスパー 21 Happy Song For You (Encore) 22 CHERRY BOMB チェリボム (Encore) 23 -Ending-  EXTRAS NO GIRL NO CRY (SILENT SIREN ver.) (2019.6.10 @ Zepp DiverCity)  Member goods introduction CM video collection
